dcterms:creator: S. Hochreiter
J. Schmidhuber
dcterms:description: A collection of artificial audio pulses generated for the task of sound localisation, consisting of two copies of a 440Hz sinewave pulse with a width of 10ms, one pulse delayed to simulate the timing differences at the left and right ears, with added noise to resemble real-world scenarios.
dcterms:title: Collection of artificial audio pulses
